text: ZAKTOMATE - Your AI Partner, Not Just a Tool.. Brand Quote: "We donâ€™t just give you tools. We become your AI team."

Shared Features across all ZAKTOMATE services include: AI Consultation & Business Audit, Zakbot Setup + Smart Optimization, Workflow Automation & Integration, AI Analytics Dashboards, On-Demand Expert Support.
Zakbot (Chatbot): A minimal, AI-powered chatbot for interacting with users via text-based conversation..

Zakbot details: Endpoint is https://final-chatbot-982a.onrender.com, UI Theme is Dark, Accent Color is Cyan. It features: Text-only interface, User/Zakbot message alignment, Responsive design, Minimalist layout.
Zakdeck (Content Generator): AI-powered slide and content engine for generating presentations and marketing material..
Zakdeck offers the following plans for content generation: 10 presentations/month, 30 presentations/month, Unlimited presentations.
OpsMate (Service Plans): Tiered service model offering Zakbot, Zakdeck, automation, and analytics tools..

OpsMate Ignite Track: Regular price is BDT 5,000 per month. Introductory price for the first month is BDT 2,500 (1st month). Features include: Zakdeck: 10 Presentations/month; Zakbot Lite: 1,500 messages/month; Email Support; AI Automation Suggestions.

OpsMate Accelerate Track: Regular price is BDT 10,000 per month. Introductory price for the first month is BDT 5,000 (1st month). Features include: Zakdeck: 30 Presentations/month; Zakbot Pro: 5,500 messages/month; Custom AI Automation (1/month); Email & Call Support.

OpsMate Transform Track: Regular price is BDT 15,000 per month. Introductory price for the first month is BDT 7,500 (1st month). Features include: Zakdeck: Unlimited Presentations; Zakbot Advanced: 24/7 support & insights; Custom Workflows (As per demand); Priority Support.
